data.name: Color Jumper OST
data.detailed_description:
Soundtrack location

After purchase, the soundtrack will be placed in your Color Jumper folder in the Steam Directory:
...\Steam\steamapps\common\Color Jumper\Soundtrack

This DLC contains the Color Jumper soundtrack and is provided in high resolution MP3 format. The soundtrack is 29 tracks long, containing mixed and unmixed versions of all the section layers.

Track list

  • Spectrum (Intro/Main)
  • Reticulation (Section 1, Mixed)
  • Gaussian (Section 2, Mixed)
  • Bloom (Section 3, Mixed)
  • Yield (Section 4, Mixed)
  • Abberation (Boss Fight)
  • Clarity (Boss Defeated)
  • Adjunct (Bonus Stages, Mixed)
  • Chromaticism (Win/Credits)
  • Reticulation (Section 1, Layer 1)
  • Reticulation (Section 1, Layer 2)
  • Reticulation (Section 1, Layer 3)
  • Reticulation (Section 1, Layer 4)
  • Gaussian (Section 2, Layer 1)
  • Gaussian (Section 2, Layer 2)
  • Gaussian (Section 2, Layer 3)
  • Gaussian (Section 2, Layer 4)
  • Bloom (Section 3, Layer 1)
  • Bloom (Section 3, Layer 2)
  • Bloom (Section 3, Layer 3)
  • Bloom (Section 3, Layer 4)
  • Yield (Section 4, Layer 1)
  • Yield (Section 4, Layer 2)
  • Yield (Section 4, Layer 3)
  • Yield (Section 4, Layer 4)
  • Adjunct (Bonus Stages, Layer 1)
  • Adjunct (Bonus Stages, Layer 2)
  • Adjunct (Bonus Stages, Layer 3)
  • Adjunct (Bonus Stages, Layer 4)

data.short_description: This DLC contains the Color Jumper soundtrack and is provided in high resolution MP3 format. The soundtrack is 29 tracks long, containing mixed and unmixed versions of all the section layers.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP SP2+
  • Processor: 2 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1 GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.9+
  • Processor: 2 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1 GB VRAM
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04+
  • Processor: 2 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1 GB VRAM
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes
